Package de.fu.scetris.web.showcase

A sample-package demonstrating the use of auto generated forms.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ShowCase A demo-module.
ShowCaseAcgtForms A demo-module that deals with auto gernated Form classes.
ShowCaseAcgtForms.SimpleForm  
ShowCaseAdvancedFormValidation A demo-module, which illustrates Form Validation.
ShowCaseAdvancedFormValidation.EnterEMail A Form which provides an email-address field
ShowCaseAdvancedFormValidation.HostnameValidator This is the Validator for the email address field above.
ShowCaseExtendedForm A demo-module which shows how to build a Form that extends another one.
ShowCaseExtendedForm.BaseForm  
ShowCaseExtendedForm.DerivedForm  
ShowCaseFormBuilder A demo-module that outlines how a Form is built.
ShowCaseFormBuilder.SimpleForm  
ShowCaseFormCommitException A demo-module which demonstrates Exception handling on a failed commit.
ShowCaseFormCommitException.EnterEMail  
ShowCaseFormControls A demo-module which showcases all available form controls.
ShowCaseFormControls.SimpleForm  
ShowCaseFormReuse A demo-module that shows how the same form can be used again immediately after commit.
ShowCaseFormReuse.Something  
ShowCaseFormValidation A demo-module, which illustrates Form Validation
ShowCaseFormValidation.EnterEMail A Form which provides an email-address field
ShowCaseFormValidation.HostnameValidator This is the Validator for the email address field above.
ShowCaseMultipleOptions A module which demonstrates a form control with multiple options.
ShowCaseMultipleOptions.SimpleForm  
 

Package de.fu.scetris.web.showcase Description

A sample-package demonstrating the use of auto generated forms.
